description: Trail leads from the end of Brewster East FSR to the heli landing of the run Sluice Box Left
directions: Highway 23 North to the Goldstream FSR (93km N of Revelstoke). Turn Right (East). At 6km turn on the Brewster FSR. Hang a left pass a bridge(Brewster East). Hang Left a second time and down to another bridge. At the end of the Road (2009) follow a faint flagged trail/line. Short steep climb to beautiful Alpine Lake.
title: Trail to Sluice Box Landing
